title: The Digital 100 in Infographics: Fastest-Growing Websites | Similarweb
description: Get insight into the industries, digital strategies, and consumer trends that defined 2022 and their potential lasting impact on the year ahead.
content: HomeBlogInsightsThe 2023 Digital 100 in Infographics Insights The 2023 Digital 100 in Infographics See the D100 winners by Molly Winik , Senior Content Marketing Manager 2 Min. January 25, 2023 X Facebook Linkedin Copy link Free Website Traffic Checker Discover your competitors' strengths and leverage them to achieve your own success Analyze Traffic Gain insight into some of the industries, digital strategies, and trends that defined 2022 and their potential lasting impact on the year ahead. This data comes from our annual Digital 100, the globally recognized ranking for the fastest-growing digital companies on the internet. Similarweb’s Digital 100 offers insight into what companies can do to strategically adapt to changes in consumer behavior after a year defined by an inflationary economy and market volatility. See the full list of winners. What the Top 100 Digital Companies Have in Common Get your copy. The Fastest-Growing News & Media Companies Get your copy. The Fastest-Growing Digital Consumer Electronics Companies Get your copy. The Fastest-Growing Digital Apparel & Accessories Companies Get your copy. The Fastest-Growing Jobs & Career Companies Get your copy. The Fastest-Growing Beauty & Cosmetics Companies Get your copy. Become a winner with Similarweb With the rise of the price-conscious consumer and an ever-growing list of competition, you need to know how to adapt to market changes when it matters most. Similarweb Digital Data is the fastest, easiest way to discover what’s really happening online and uncover digital leaders in your industry. Whether you’re an established brand or you recently launched, get insights to beat the competition online, grow exponentially, and gain that digital edge. by Molly Winik Senior Content Marketing Manager Molly has 8+ years of experience in marketing, content creation, and PR. Her work has been featured on Mention, The Times of Israel, and Culture Trip. This post is subject to Similarweb legal notices and disclaimers.
